column1: A look ahead, a new life, and a new world I had hoped for, but I am grateful to be here now and I am so happy to see that I am back on track. The experience has opened a new world for me my hope is that I will be able to compete I am so happy I am not the only one that is looking forward to this opportunity. "I will do everything I can to make sure I succeed, that even if it's my last chance, I am still in this journey to succeed. "I am so thankful to be here, I am even more grateful to be here. "But that's not all, I am also looking forward to being as a new Miss World champion, and the moment I win is a dream come true."
Miss World competition winner Miss Wales Darcey Corria wins Miss World's Miss World crown
